AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collective child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective and was neurally integrated at a very young age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aspirant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective and was determined to reach a high rank among the elite.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice of a collective craftsman, [PAWN_pronoun] was mostly put to menial tasks but learned a few tidbits from watching their master.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collective problem child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective, but was unable to be neurally integrated until late chilhood because of deviance and behavioral issues.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wise child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective and was revered for [PAWN_possessive] peculiar early age wisdom and understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Synthesizer tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was put to work at an early age tending to crystal synthesizers, gathering crystal from the stock or tending the basins and watching for genetic defects.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of prophecy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a day forseen many years ago by Crystalloid heirarchs. [PAWN_nameDef] was granted a life among the elite in the collective and was extremely pampered.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Construct interested
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective and was intrigued with their constructs. At an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] helped sythesize prisms and guardians for the collective to use.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Late child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective but was physically unable to connect to the neural network. After a series of painful operations, [PAWN_possessive] brain was finally able to connect to the network in [PAWN_pronoun] early teens. Having a developed mind that was not neurally connected to the network at a young age proved to be dissonant to both the collective and [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Conscript child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective and was immediately placed in a combat training program after showing aggression to other children.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deadeye
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was praised by [PAWN_possessive] peers at a young age for being a great shot. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was often pushed by [PAWN_possessive] parents to be the best, causing [PAWN_objective] to crack under stress often.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Freeborn child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born outside of a collective, and was never influenced by a neural network. Having been born into a small community, [PAWN_pronoun] learned some of the basics of colony life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Peddler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would travel with trading caravans, making little trinkets or toys to sell in [PAWN_possessive] free time to sell.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was found by humans as a baby in an escape pod. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised in an orpahage with human children, and was picked on by the other kids for being weird looking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Disconnected child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a collective, and was only a few years integrated into the network until the connection was broken by [PAWN_possessive] parents going renegade. [PAWN_nameDef] had to learn the basics of survival while on the run from the loyalists.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young looter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bandit at a young age, tagging along with raiding parties to loot the battlefields. [PAWN_nameDef] carried a homemade gun around, but when people got too close, [PAWN_nameDef] would run as fast as [PAWN_possessive] legs could take [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trained soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] completed years of training and joined their collective's combat forces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Listener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] held the important task of listening for psionic activity coming from other planets, sent from many centuries ago. [PAWN_nameDef] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to learning from them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Construct manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of creating and maintaining a battalion of constructs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Secret police
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a collective's divergence regulation force, maintaining the integrity of the collective by "removing" problematic elements from it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Medical synthesizer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] life synthesizing crystalline flesh for medical purposes and operating on other Crystalloids.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Runner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the Crystalloids who disconnected from the neural network and escaped the collective, or a descendent of one who did so. [PAWN_nameDef] spent years on the run, doding constructs, the secret police, and soldiers until managing to meet up with other renegades.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a basic citizen of a collective, [PAWN_pronoun] lives with ease and in luxury and never questions the authority of their collective.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: High citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a privledged citizen of a collective, [PAWN_pronoun] lives with extreme luxury and is a member of the elite. [PAWN_pronoun] is a part of the collective that descides on its direction.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lost
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a collective, until it fell apart. The shock of losing the neural netowork drove [PAWN_objective] to insanity. Left to silence, [PAWN_pronoun] wandered the wilderness like a nomad, until [PAWN_pronoun] found a renegade community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Renegade commoner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined up with other renegades early on and built a free thinking community with them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Renegade leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined up with other renegades and became a figure they look up to. [PAWN_nameDef] inspires [PAWN_possessive] other renegades to courage.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valkyrie born
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a renegade society, being a valkyrie meant [PAWN_pronoun] was always in trouble.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Unknown
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to unknown parents in unknown circumstance. [PAWN_nameDef] has no recollection of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, except for amulet with [PAWN_possessive] name.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rascal
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a young rogue, stealing from unwary traveling merchants when they visited [PAWN_possessive] settlement. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't always successful and often had to rely on [PAWN_possessive] legs to sprint away from angry caravan guards.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wilderness child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with [PAWN_possessive] parents in seclusion. [PAWN_pronoun] learned basic survival skills as a child, but lacked social interaction.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collective born valkyrie
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a valkyrie, to the surprise of [PAWN_possessive] parents. One way or another, [PAWN_pronoun] was spared from the typical fate that other valkyrie born children have.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valkyrian citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a basic part of a renegade society, the only type of Crystalloid community that would accept Valkyries; a variant of Crystalloid that values honor and violence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valkyrian artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who focused not on combat, but on creating depictions of combat in art. [PAWN_pronoun] may not be as capable with the sword, but is definitely more capable with the brush.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bar brawler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who earned a bad reputation at taverns because of [PAWN_possessive] boisterous demeanor and tactless attitude. [PAWN_pronoun] had [PAWN_possessive] fair share of bar room scuffles and often won.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valkyrian bandit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who made a living taking things from others. Being a bloodthirsty species, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have much trouble intimidating others with [PAWN_possessive] line of work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle sister
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who excitedly fought the front lines with a squad of other Valkyries. [PAWN_pronoun] was very talented with all sorts melee weapons, cleaving through enemies with ease.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who fought with [PAWN_possessive] sisters of battle, but served primarily as the medic to [PAWN_possessive] squad. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have time to cleave through as many enemies as [PAWN_possessive] sisters did but learned valuable medical training.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle matron
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who led a squad of battle sisters. [PAWN_pronoun] was unparralled in combat, training every day, and leaving menial tasks for underlings to preform.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Heavy equiptment miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Valkyrie who spent years deep into the earth, operating large mining rigs to unearth valuable minerals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collective scribe
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] held the task of observing and documenting psionic oddities near a collective, a full time task that left little room for anything else. The job was suprising dangerous and [PAWN_nameDef] ran into many situations where they only made it out alive by using their sharp wit and a sharper tongue.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collective crusader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] belonged to a special order of strongly collectivist Crystalloids who are known for their combat prowess on the front lines of battle and for their extremely aggressive behavior to anyone who breaks the norm in society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ex-collective crusader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a collective crusader until they witnessed something unsettling and fled the collective. [PAWN_pronoun] is shoken from the events and prefers not to talk to others about it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Crop grower
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Crystalloid who worked the fields for a living. Using their psionic energy to benefit the growth of their crops, they yielded bountiful harvests. An accident involving a fire as [PAWN_pronoun] gave some energy caused psionic dissonance and left [PAWN_objective] mentally scarred from the experience.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Riverside nomad
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived by foraging berries and catching fish by a river, never really settling down. When a band of traveling bandits came by, [PAWN_nameDef] was spooked, left the river, and never returned.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanoid hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a mechanoid hunter, seeking ruins and reports of the robots to dismantle them for parts to sell.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collective musician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a musician working in a collective. The job did not pay well but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to talk up [PAWN_possessive] abilities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Slacker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] mooched off the system in place for the collective, taking and not giving anything back. With their excess of free time, [PAWN_pronoun] studied various topics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Second class citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was impoverished within a collective. Scrounging up food to eat and avoiding the gaze of the more well off were [PAWN_possessive] priorities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Crystal merchant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to belong to a roving band of Crystalloid merchants who sold crystalline merchandise they produced.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Liberator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would covertly sneak into collective territory to help liberate individuals who long for freedom for the collective.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Enslaved miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was trapped in a worse fate after [PAWN_pronoun] escaped from a collective, enslaved by cruel bandits who placed [PAWN_objective] in a work camp, mining away at compacted steel. [PAWN_nameDef] made a break for it when [PAWN_pronoun] saw an opening.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Psionic healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor, putting their psionic affinity to use to cure the ailments others. Their ability allowed them to miraciously heal people who would of otherwise been unable to recover.
